title: Microsoft Teams: Enhancement to app usage report -Â support for Line of Business apps
description:
,An updated version of Teams app usage report with support for Live of business apps in alignment with Teams app usage in Microsoft 365 admin center. This will help admins track all app usage metrics over time.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/teams-analytics-and-reports/app-usage-report
GA date: October CY2022
